content.text: I'm doing well! How about you?
I'm doing good! I'm a psychology major and I love to read. What about you?
I love to cook! I'm always daydreaming about my future acting career and the perfect romantic partner, which leads me to procrastinate on my current projects. What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is To Kill a Mockingbird because it teaches important lessons about empathy and justice. I'm also currently reading The Great Gatsby.
I love To Kill a Mockingbird! I've read it a few times. I've never heard of The Great Gatsby, but it sounds interesting.
It's a really good book! It's about the American Dream and the pursuit of happiness.
Oh, that sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a classic for a reason.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to hike and camp. I also like to go kayaking.
That sounds really fun! I've never been kayaking before, but it looks like a lot of fun.
It is! It's a great way to relax and enjoy nature.
I bet! I'll have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a great way to get exercise too.
